data.text: In the eighth month, in the second year of Darius, came the word of the
The
Therefore say thou unto them, Thus saith the
Be ye not as your fathers, unto whom the former prophets have cried, saying, Thus saith the
Your fathers, where
But my words and my statutes, which I commanded my servants the prophets, did they not take hold of your fathers? and they returned and said, Like as the
¶ Upon the four and twentieth day of the eleventh month, which
I saw by night, and behold a man riding upon a red horse, and he stood among the myrtle trees that

And I am very sore displeased with the heathen
Therefore thus saith the

And the
Then said I, What come these to do? And he spake, saying, These
